translation.en: Let's make that money.
What have you guys been eating?
Score!
Shh!
Gah… this isn't what it looks like. I'm only here for your poop.
translation.ko: 그런 거 아니야 난 너희 똥만 가지러 왔어

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, I'm here for the mushrooms in your poop.
translation.ko: 정확히는 너희 똥 속의 버섯을 가지러 왔어

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound any better.
Catch!
Sorry I can't stay for dinner.
Uh-oh.
Come on, who throws somebody at somebody?
Whoa!
Large rats.
Dirty hands, filthy rich.
Hurry up, man.
I can't do business until you deliver the goods.
translation.ko: 물건을 가져와야 장사를 할 거 아니야?

translation.en: Tyson, you're in for a treat, you lucky wizard.
translation.ko: 타이슨, 이 운 좋은 마법사 오늘 횡재한 줄 아세요

translation.en: Freshly tracked.
Ah, it better be.
My dupe spell is useless without multiplying mushrooms.
translation.ko: 증식 버섯이 없으면 복제 스펠은 쓸모가 없어

translation.en: Oh, yeah, that's the good stuff right there.
Hurry up, man.
You don't wanna get busted for doing magic in public.
One more second.
All right! Double your pleasure.
You, get to Tribeca.
You, Soho.
And get my money back before you disappear this time!
translation.ko: 이번엔 사라지기 전에 돈 가져와야 해!

translation.en: Oh, look at this little guy.
How's about a mini-dog, Spellbound? On the house.
translation.ko: 스펠바운드, 미니 핫도그 줄까? 내가 쏘는 거야

translation.en: Uh… I don't eat magic.
You may be half-sized, but you charge full price. You hear me?
translation.ko: 몸은 절반이어도 값은 똑같이 받아, 알았지?

translation.en: Getting partners was the best business decision I ever made.
translation.ko: 사업을 시작하고 제일 잘한 게 동업자를 만든 거라니까

translation.en: You got someone watching your back, kid?
Ha! You volunteering?
Nah, I'm not trying to buddy up with somebody
on the wrong side of The Pie Maker.
Who cares about that old witch?
Her bakers are searching for you, kid.
She wants you that bad,
you must've really screwed up tracking something for her.
It's fine. I'm close to finding a Fugu Rose.
translation.ko: 상관없어요 곧 푸구 장미를 찾을 거니까요

translation.en: Whoa. That rose is worth serious money, kid.
You found one?
I just need help to track the last step.
translation.ko: 마지막 단계를 도와줄 사람만 있으면 돼요

translation.en: Once I get that, ha!
All my debts are cleared and I'm set.
Yeah, except you'll still be stinky,
translation.ko: 빚을 갚아도 넌 냄새나고 친구도 없고

translation.en: friendless, and, oh yeah, not magic.
translation.ko: 빚을 갚아도 넌 냄새나고 친구도 없고 또… 그렇지, 마법도 못 쓰잖아

translation.en: Hygiene's a scam, friends are a scam,
and, oh yeah, magic is a scam.
Call it what you want, kid, but my magic buddies are making me rich.
translation.ko: 네가 뭐라든 난 마법 친구들 덕에 부자가 될 거야

translation.en: Hey-hey, guys.
I was just on my way to see you--
Hey, where were you?
You see that little hot dog guy down the block?
translation.ko: 저 밑에 핫도그 노점 있는 거 알지?

translation.en: You have to try one of his dogs.
-[grunts] -[baker] We searched. No magic on him.
Daniel, my boy.
I always forget how cute your place is, Pie Maker.
The pies, the… curtains,
the cyclops henchmen.
I didn't become the most wicked witch of New York
by having low-life spell Trackers fail me.
translation.ko: 삼류 마술 사냥꾼 하나 제대로 못 부릴 것 같아?

translation.en: My clients expect the best magical ingredients.
translation.ko: 내 고객들은 최고의 마법 재료를 원해

translation.en: Ingredients you were supposed to deliver.
Where are my gnome whiskers?
I was gonna get them to you, I swear!
But the Bureau sicced a dowser on me, I had to ditch 'em. I have a plan.
translation.ko: 당국의 다우저가 따라붙는 바람에 못 했지만 계획이 다 있어요

translation.en: The magic world knows my pies have the most dangerous ingredients.
translation.ko: 내 파이에 얼마나 위험한 재료들이 들어가는지는 온 마법 세계가 다 알아

translation.en: Ingredients you promised to find me and failed.
translation.ko: 넌 그걸 구해 오겠다고 약속해 놓고는 못 지켰어

translation.en: That's fair, but I'm tracking something big for you.
translation.ko: 그건 인정하지만 더 좋은 걸 가져다드릴 거예요

translation.en: Yes, for me, because you owe me.
translation.ko: 당연히 그래야지 넌 내게 빚진 게 있으니까

translation.en: You're my Tracker now.
You will do nothing
but find every little illegal ingredient I need for my magic pies.
translation.ko: 앞으로는 내 마법 파이에 넣을 불법 재료를 찾는 데만 집중해

translation.en: I told you, the Bureau heat on me has been intense,
translation.ko: 말했잖아요, 당국이 내게 집중 감시를 붙였다고요

translation.en: but when I can track again, I'll make it up to you.
It's all about you.
Uh-uh-uh. You're not telling me the truth.
I haven't done any tracking at all, I swear.
translation.ko: 그동안 정말 사냥 못 했어요 진짜예요!

translation.en: Bring out…
…The Beast.
Ah… a pig?
Hey! Come on.
[giggling] Get this thing off of me.
It tickles, but in a scary way.
[Pie Maker] Don't struggle.
The pig sniffer is powerful enough
to sense any magic from a hundred yards away.
Hey, what the--
Ogre mushrooms.
Fresh.
Impressive work.
Get his eye-patch ready.
This isn't necessary!
Now, which are you, Daniel?
A heart? Oh, no, no, no.
You clearly think you're a star.
I could get you a Fugu Rose!
Impossible.
No one's seen a Fugu Rose in years.
translation.ko: 오랫동안 그 누구도 푸구 장미를 보지 못했어

translation.en: They're priceless.
I know where one is.
My best Trackers couldn't do that.
No way you could, silly boy.
Give me 24 hours and it's yours, if you erase all my debt.
translation.ko: 24시간만 주면 구해 올게요 그럼 빚은 다 갚는 거예요

translation.en: Well, dear, we have a deal.
[Pie Maker] You better not disappoint me again,
translation.ko: 이번엔 날 실망시키지 않는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: because you won't like what this spell will do to you.
translation.ko: 그랬다간 이 스펠의 쓴맛을 보게 될 테니까

translation.en: Not one bit.
Great. Heh. You'll be seeing me soon.
There is still the little matter of you lying to me, though.
translation.ko: 문제는 네가 나한테 거짓말을 한다는 거야

translation.en: -Wait! We have a deal. -[Pie Maker chuckles evilly]
My dear,
you can still find the Rose with one eye.
translation.ko: 장미를 찾는 데는 눈 하나면 충분하단다

translation.en: No! That activates the oven to full power.
translation.ko: 안 돼! 그걸 돌리면 화력이 최대치로 올라가

translation.en: Turn off the oven, you buffoon!
Ha! What are you doing?
[Daniel] You're just the kind of help I've been looking for.
See you lovebirds in 24 hours.
[Pie Maker] I'll take both your eyes for that!
translation.ko: 양쪽 눈을 다 없애 줄 테다!

translation.en: -[tires screeching] -Whoa, hey!
Gotta catch my breath.
-You said it. -[screams]
Did you just talk?
Hey, thanks for saving my bacon, man. She is awful.
translation.ko: 날 구해 줘서 고마워 정말 못된 할망구야

translation.en: She has a place full of food, never gives me a crumb.
translation.ko: 음식이 그렇게 많은데도 부스러기조차 안 줘

translation.en: So, you smell magic and talk.
Any other tricks I should know about? You turn into a car or something?
translation.ko: 혹시 다른 재주도 있어? 차로 변한다든가?

translation.en: Oh, you done it now. How did you know I turn into a car?
translation.ko: 어떻게 알았어? 내가 차로 변한다는 걸?

translation.en: I'm just playing. I can't turn into a car. That'd be stupid.
translation.ko: 농담이야, 차로 못 변해 뭔 바보 같은 소리야? 너 바보구나?

translation.en: You're stupid. Aw, it's a little bit endearing, though.
translation.ko: 뭔 바보 같은 소리야? 너 바보구나? 그래도 귀여운 맛이 있네

translation.en: Well, thanks again, I owe you.
All right. I'm out. Peace.
Throwing up a, "Peace, I'm out" sign, you just can't tell 'cause I have a hoof.
translation.ko: 손으로도 '피스'를 하고 싶지만 난 발굽이어서 아쉽네

translation.en: Uh-huh. You do owe me.
And I have a way you can repay me right now.
I-I-I-I-I'm not going anywhere with any magician ever again.
translation.ko: 난 다시는 마법사를 따라가지 않을 거야

translation.en: Oh, well, you're in luck. I'm not a magician, I'm a Tracker.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 다행이네 난 마법사가 아니라 사냥꾼이거든

translation.en: -I just sell magical ingredients. -Uh-huh. Cool story, bruh.
translation.ko: 마법 재료를 팔기만 해 응, 잘 들었어

translation.en: Wait, I know where a Fugu Rose is-- Ish.
translation.ko: 난 푸구 장미가 있는 곳을 알아 대충

translation.en: I don't know exactly where,
so I need your magic smelling skills to get me to the finish.
translation.ko: 마법 냄새를 맡는 네가 도와준다면 찾을 수 있어

translation.en: Pie Maker wanted to take your eye before you wrecked her shop,
translation.ko: 네가 가게를 뒤엎기 전에도 파이메이커는 네 눈을 뽑으려 했어

translation.en: what'd you think she's gonna want now? A spleen?
Oh, please. She'll be so happy when she gets the Rose, she won't even care.
translation.ko: 장미를 보면 기분이 좋아서 신경도 안 쓸 거야

translation.en: The Rose'll clear all my debts to her, and then some.
translation.ko: 그 장미면 파이메이커에게 진 빚을 갚고도 남는다고

translation.en: So, you'll walk away.
Oh, good for you. What's in it for me?
translation.ko: 그래서 자유로워지면 너나 좋지 내가 얻는 건 뭔데?

translation.en: If you help me get this Rose,
I promise I won't give it to her unless she sets you free.
translation.ko: 파이메이커가 널 풀어 주기 전엔 절대 그 장미를 안 넘길게

translation.en: Out on my own. Love it. What else?
We can get pizza on the way.
[chuckling] Yes, I am very in.
Here, just hoof-pump it, bruh.
What do I call you anyways? Piggy?
Oh, I get it. "Piggy." Because I'm a pig.
Because all pigs look alike to you.
My name is Hoagie. Not "Pig," not "Piggy," not "Oinkie," just "Hoagie."
translation.ko: 내 이름은 호기야 꿀돼지도 꿀꿀이도 아닌 호기

translation.en: Hoagie, I was kidding.
[Hoagie] Just for that "Piggy" crack, I'm gonna pick the pizza.
translation.ko: 좋아, 어쨌든 꿀돼지라고 했으니까 피자는 내가 고를래

translation.en: [Daniel, munching] Oh!
Good call on the veggie pizza.
Yeah, I don't know what it is,
but I just don't feel right eating pepperoni anymore.
translation.ko: 이젠 페퍼로니를 먹는 게 마음이 불편해

translation.en: What's the deal with this Albright place?
I've tracked the Fugu Rose for a long time.
The search led me here.
A soap factory.
It's more than a soap factory.
I've snuck a bunch of times. It's in there. Somewhere.
translation.ko: 내가 여러 번 들어가 봤는데 분명 저 안에 있어

translation.en: How do you know that? You don't have my nose for this.
translation.ko: 어떻게 알아? 나만큼 코가 좋지도 않잖아

translation.en: It's called planning, dummy.
Oh, look at me.
I got my hands so I can type and Wiki stuff and think I'm sooo great.
translation.ko: '난 손이 있어서 위키피디아 검색도 해' '난 정말 잘났다니까'

translation.en: Hoagie, keep quiet and stay loose.
translation.ko: 호기, 조용히 하고 몸에 힘 풀어

translation.en: Loose? What do you mean?
Whoa, dude, that is not cool.
I'm already down an eye, you trying to break a leg too?
[Daniel sighs] I did say stay loose.
[Hoagie] So sorry, I haven't exactly been keeping up with my yoga.
translation.ko: 요즘 요가를 안 한 내 잘못이네

translation.en: There's magic all over the place in here,
but I'm getting one really strong scent.
translation.ko: 특히 강한 냄새를 풍기는 뭔가가 있어

translation.en: [Daniel] I knew it. It's this lab, right?
translation.ko: 그럴 줄 알았어, 이 연구실이지? "출입 금지 - 위험 인화성 물질"

translation.en: No, the strongest whiff of magic is…
translation.ko: 아니, 강한 마법 냄새가 나는 곳은…

translation.en: There! Ta-da!
Oh, great, you're defective.
I literally just fed you.
Because I'm a pig. Because pigs love to eat.
The alchemist triad? Bingo.
I wonder what it could be.
Not that one either.
Are you sure you did it right?
Uh… I don't even think there's any kind of magic in here.
This is nothing but a dusty old vending machine.
My nose doesn't lie.
Your nose is just trying to get a free Twinkie.
Oh, I see. That's how it's gonna be.
[Daniel] I'll give 'em credit.
This was a great hiding place.
Oh, this room reeks of magic.
It's itching the inside of my brain.
Get it together, Hoagie. We're on the clock.
translation.ko: 정신 차려, 호기 시간 없단 말이야

translation.en: Only a few hours until my deal runs out.
Hoagie?
Where'd you go?
[in evil voice] There is no Hoagie, only King of the Squid People.
translation.ko: 호기는 없다 난 오징어 족속의 왕이다

translation.en: Do squid things for me.
Get down off the tentacore.
Chill. I'm just having a little fun.
translation.ko: 긴장 풀어, 장난 좀 친 것 가지고

translation.en: I'll chill when we get the Rose.
-Don't touch anything. -Hmm.
There's no telling what's magically booby-trapped in here.
[gasps] There it is.
That's the Fugu Rose? Just grab some flowers and split.
translation.ko: 저게 푸구 장미라고? 꽃 따서 나가자

translation.en: This whole place was built around this to protect it.
translation.ko: 오직 저 장미를 지키려고 이 큰 건물을 지었어

translation.en: Does that give you any idea of how powerful it is?
translation.ko: 저게 얼마나 강한 물건인지 감이 와?

translation.en: One rose on this bush can be used to extend life by decades,
translation.ko: 이 덤불의 장미 중 한 송이만이 수명을 수십 년 늘릴 수 있어

translation.en: but touching any of the others brings instant, painful death.
translation.ko: 그 외의 다른 꽃을 건드리면 그 자리에서 고통스럽게 죽어

translation.en: Oh, I get your plan now.
You mistook me for a guinea pig.
-No, I-- -[squeals]
[screaming] A little help!
Hoagie!
This is why you don't touch anything.
Oh, no. I'm too young to become pepperoni!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 꽃다운 나이에 페퍼로니가 될 수는 없어

translation.en: Immune to stun spells. That's real--
Score!
Let's get that rose and get out.
Heaven help me, it tastes so good!
-Hoagie… get me… the sword… now. -[thumping]
-[thumping continues] -This… genuinely… hurts.
[Hoagie] I've got the sword!
Daniel! You want me? Come and get me, land sushi.
translation.ko: 대니얼! 횟감 주제에, 내가 상대해 주마!

translation.en: Oh, man, did you just touch that rose?
Oh, I bet you're feeling stupid now.
Daniel! Tell me you're okay.
Didn't I say not to touch anything?!
You almost got me killed!
No, I saved you.
From a thing you brought to life with your touching!
translation.ko: 저게 너 때문에 깨어났잖아 네가 건드려서!

translation.en: Now I'm drenched in walking fish guts.
translation.ko: 난 걸어 다니는 해물의 내장을 뒤집어썼다고!

translation.en: -Pfft. You're still alive. -[sighs]
You want this rose or not? Because I know which one to definitely not touch.
translation.ko: 장미 안 딸 거야? 어떤 걸 건드리면 안 되는지 확실히 알았어

translation.en: Tell me the right one to pick.
I'm trying. I'm a little fired up right now.
I'm not used to facing death so many times in one day.
translation.ko: 죽을 고비를 이렇게 많이 넘긴 날은 처음이라고

translation.en: Yes!
Best Tracker alive.
Man, I was like 65% sure I was right. Thank goodness.
Wait, what?
Uh, those were decent odds. Just take the victory lap and be happy.
translation.ko: 그 정도면 괜찮은 확률이야 성공 세리머니나 해

translation.en: Come on, I got you.
Alley-oop.
-Thanks. -Good work, man.
What do you think about hanging around? We make an okay team, yeah?
translation.ko: 나랑 같이 안 다닐래? 우리 팀워크 괜찮잖아

translation.en: Oh, so I can help you make money off of my power. What an offer.
translation.ko: 재주는 내가 부리고 돈은 네가 벌고? 됐다고 해

translation.en: Where are you gonna go?
You're a magic talking pig. The normal world won't know what to do with you.
translation.ko: 넌 말하는 마법 돼지야 평범한 세상에선 못 살아

translation.en: Thanks. I'll take my chances.
Lots of better jobs out there for a pig than being your nose servant.
translation.ko: 네 시중을 드는 것보다 좋은 직업이 얼마나 많은데

translation.en: Hoagie, you're right.
We can make money.
Together. Split it 50/50.
Watch each other's backs. What'd you say?
Now you're talking. All right. I'm in.
Dowsers. Run for it!
I swear I never touched anything.
[female dowser] By order of the Bureau of Magical Enforcement,
you are both under arrest.
I do not know this guy.
We are not together.
Thanks.
